title: Logo Font
content:
Found this font on a logo.

Any help would be appreciated.

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415230218/http:/typophile.com/files/Font_46.jpg) | 8.04 KB |
author: pete28

comments.content:
The original was Filmotype Lasalle, designed by Ray Baker for Filmotype in 1952. Filmotype has produced a digital version based on its original font filmstrips

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415230218im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FilmotypeLasalleAsTruephonic_5214.gif)
  [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/lasalle/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415230218/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/lasalle/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/lasalle/")  
Don
